contexts.context: ...though a Telvanni wizard may be, no individual can withstand the <mark>march</mark> of history. The Indoril are loved by the people for...
.... Recruit must also be proficient at athletics, both to <mark>march</mark> long distances with heavy packs, and to advance and maneuver...
..., while Nerevar mustered the other Houses and nomad tribes and <mark>marched</mark> to meet the Dwemer-Dagoth-Westerner forces.
